articles.author: Kevin Williams
articles.title: How Spirit Airlines' uncertain future could add cost and stress to travel across America - CNBC
articles.description: From small Pennsylvania airports to college students and family fliers, Spirit Airlines' financial struggles will reverberate across the nation.
articles.content: A federal judge's order blocking a $3.8 billion-dollar deal that would have JetBlue Airways purchase rival Spirit Airlines leaves Spirit with an uncertain future. But the ruling didn't just leave the… [+6401 chars]

articles.author: Corrie Pelc
articles.title: Colon cancer deaths are on the rise while overall cancer deaths drop - Medical News Today
articles.description: Colorectal or colon cancer deaths are increasing, especially in younger Americans, even when overall cancer deaths are falling, according to new data from the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:
• New data from the American Cancer Society shows that colorectal cancer deaths have continued to increase.
  • Meanwhile, overall cancer deaths have decreased in the United States.
